TraitDef.label: Destruction Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Destruction deals with harnessing the forces of fire, frost, and shock to damage and debilitate foes. Masters of Destruction can unleash devastating magical attacks.

li.label: Destruction Apprentice
li.description: A novice in the destructive arts, capable of minor offensive spells and basic elemental manipulation.

li.label: Destruction Adept
li.description: An experienced practitioner of destruction magic, capable of moderately powerful offensive spells and improved elemental control.

li.label: Destruction Master
li.description: A master of the destructive arts whose spells can devastate entire battlefields. Their understanding of elemental forces is unparalleled.

TraitDef.label: Restoration Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Restoration deals with healing wounds, curing diseases, and providing magical protection. Masters of Restoration can heal even the most grievous injuries.

li.label: Restoration Apprentice
li.description: A novice healer capable of basic healing spells and minor protective enchantments.

li.label: Restoration Adept
li.description: An experienced healer whose restorative magic can cure diseases and mend serious wounds with greater efficiency.

li.label: Restoration Master
li.description: A master healer whose magic can restore life itself and provide powerful protective barriers against harm.

TraitDef.label: Illusion Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Illusion deals with manipulating the mind, altering perception, and controlling behavior. Masters of Illusion can become invisible and bend others to their will.

li.label: Illusion Apprentice
li.description: A novice illusionist capable of minor mind tricks and basic invisibility spells.

li.label: Illusion Adept
li.description: An experienced illusionist whose magic can charm enemies and provide enhanced stealth capabilities.

li.label: Illusion Master
li.description: A master of illusion whose spells can dominate minds completely and render themselves nearly undetectable.

TraitDef.label: Alteration Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Alteration deals with changing the fundamental properties of objects and creatures. Masters of Alteration can transmute materials and alter physical laws.

li.label: Alteration Apprentice
li.description: A novice who can perform basic transmutation and minor alterations to physical properties.

li.label: Alteration Adept
li.description: An experienced transmuter capable of significant alterations to matter and enhanced crafting abilities.

li.label: Alteration Master
li.description: A master of alteration whose magic can fundamentally reshape reality and transmute any material with ease.

TraitDef.label: Conjuration Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Conjuration deals with summoning creatures from other planes and binding souls. Masters of Conjuration can call forth powerful allies and create magical weapons.

li.label: Conjuration Apprentice
li.description: A novice summoner capable of calling minor creatures and creating basic bound weapons.

li.label: Conjuration Adept
li.description: An experienced conjurer who can summon more powerful creatures and maintain multiple summons simultaneously.

li.label: Conjuration Master
li.description: A master summoner whose magic can call forth legendary creatures and bind the souls of enemies.

TraitDef.label: Mysticism Mastery
TraitDef.description: The school of Mysticism deals with the most esoteric magical arts - teleportation, soul manipulation, and dimensional magic. Masters of Mysticism understand the deepest mysteries of magic itself.

li.label: Mysticism Apprentice
li.description: A novice mystic who can perform basic detection spells and minor teleportation magic.

li.label: Mysticism Adept
li.description: An experienced mystic whose understanding of esoteric magic grants enhanced perception and dimensional awareness.

li.label: Mysticism Master
li.description: A master of the mystical arts whose understanding of magic transcends normal reality. They can manipulate souls, space, and time itself.
